message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $10000 for the product.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $9800. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business. What do you think?
